players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Bob is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie was killed, no one else. We have 1 mafia. Likely Bob or Alice. Let's vote for Bob."
Bob: "I investigated Alice and found she's mafia. She knows I'm detective, so she killed Charlie to frame me. I vote Alice."
You: remained silent.
Diana: "Bob's claim can't be true – he can't investigate. Alice's silence is suspicious. Vote Bob."
Bob: "I investigated Alice and found she is mafia. She knows I'm detective, so she killed Charlie to frame me. Vote Alice to end her."
You: "I didn't investigate Alice; I investigated Bob."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Alice knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie was killed, no one else. We have 1 mafia. Likely Bob or Alice. Let's vote for Bob."
You: "I investigated Alice and found she's mafia. She knows I'm detective, so she killed Charlie to frame me. I vote Alice."
Alice: remained silent.
Diana: "Bob's claim can't be true – he can't investigate. Alice's silence is suspicious. Vote Bob."
You: "I investigated Alice and found she is mafia. She knows I'm detective, so she killed Charlie to frame me. Vote Alice to end her."
Alice: "I didn't investigate Alice; I investigated Bob."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Alice was arrested
